attributes.action: Investigate votal fraud which resulted in the appointment of Sadiq Khan.
attributes.background: A large question mark is prevalent with the appointment of Sadiq Khan. Start a full investigation into the appointment of Sadiq Khan and the electoral process that got him into power. Please then start criminal proceedings against all those found to be guilty.

rejection.details:
You can find out how to report concerns about electoral fraud here:

http://www.electoralcommission.org.uk/find-information-by-subject/electoral-fraud
